text:
ce="preserve">Group A of the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup matches took place from 7 to 17 June 2019. The group consisted of the hosts nation France, Nigeria, Norway and South Korea. France and Norway, along with the third-placed team, Nigeria (as one of the four best third-placed teams), advanced to the round of 16.
Matches.
All times listed are local, CEST (UTC+2).
